item.title: Getting a Technical Job at Rackspace
item.description: You’ve probably noticed that the blog has slowed down a bit recently.

item.title: Do your homework before a technical interview
item.description: If you work for a growing company like I do, it’s inevitable that you’ll have to do your fair share of interviewing.
